byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

abstract: Presidential candidate Donald J Trump criticizes war record of Sen John McCain, naval veteran who was shot down during Vietnam War and endured five years as prisoner of war; comments draw large-scale backlash from rivals and senior Republicans who had refrained from criticizing Trump's previous incendiary remarks, but are now seizing opportunity to attack candidate who has so far hijacked primary race.
lead_paragraph: In Iowa, Mr. Trump disparaged Mr. McCain’s Vietnam War record, saying: “He’s not a war hero. He’s a war hero because he was captured. I like people who weren’t captured.”

headline.main: Donald Trump Says John McCain Is No War Hero, Setting Off Another Storm
headline.print_headline: No Hero, Trump Says of McCain, Stirring Outrage

snippet: In Iowa, Mr. Trump disparaged Mr. McCain’s Vietnam War record, saying: “He’s not a war hero. He’s a war hero because he was captured. I like people who weren’t captured.”
